name: Sophie the Witch
description:
A group of villagers knocking on a witch's door is never a good sign! Sophie must keep a cool head if she is to convince them that there is nothing strange going on in her forest while her adopted fairy daughter runs and hides! Bella, her daughter, is a incredibly rare mythical creature who could fetch an enormous price if she is to be caught. Lately, she has gotten reckless and snuck out when Sophie wasn't looking! If she was spotted by the villagers, it's game over!

This heartfelt, adorable story about a mother doing whatever it takes to protect her daughter is available now!

This story is a prologue to “The Witch and the Fairy” which will be released  later this year. Please follow me for updates!

 A compelling 12,000 word story.

Gorgeous 4K UHD artwork.

 A beautiful, entirely custom soundtrack featuring six orchestral songs.

 
Sophie is a kindhearted, hardworking, witch who lives deep in the forest with her adopted daughter Bella! Most of Sophie’s days consist of managing her potions business that she runs out of her house. She takes her job of being a mother very seriously and would do anything to protect her daughter despite the risky hijinks Bella manages to get herself into. 



Bella is a energetic, intelligent, and mischievous fairy that lives with Sophie. She is an extremely rare mythical creature who’s existence must be kept secret. The last time a fairy was spotted in the wild was over 100 years ago and they seldom leave the fairy realm. Bella left the fairy realm for unknown reasons despite being a famous actress.



Lily is a barmaid from the local tavern in the village on the edge of the forest where Sophie lives. Despite it being a bit of a walk, Lily visits her friend every other day when she’s not at work. Sophie has an enormous crush on Lily, and it is very likely that Lily feels the same but they are both too nervous to make the first move.
